dublin_core.dcvalue: This paper briefly examines some major cultural social factors influencing the quality of healthcare services in Saudi Arabia then offers a telecare model used to provide the National Guard diabetic patients at King Abdulaziz Medical City in Riyadh with an alternative method of receiving healthcare services to improve services and cope with healthcare social and cultural obstacles
Studies in health technology and informatics
Applying a methodological approach for a telecare solution in Saudi Arabia.
